title: Using the Area Formula
text: The area of an ellipse is given by $$a b \pi$$. Since $$a=\sqrt{5}$$ and $$b=2$$, the area of the ellipse is $$2\sqrt{5} \pi$$
speech: The area of an ellipse is given by  a b pi, . Since  a is equal to, the square root of 5  and  b is equal to 2 , the area of the ellipse is , 2 the square root of 5 pi
